sentences.en: Conditions have improved considerably over the past few years.
sentences.cn: 过去几年里条件已经得到了很大的改善。

sentences.en: He has gone down considerably in my estimation.
sentences.cn: 我对他的评价已经一落千丈。

sentences.en: His regiments were considerably under strength.
sentences.cn: 他的几个团兵力严重不足。

sentences.en: In the following years, his fortunes improved considerably.
sentences.cn: 在后来的几年中, 他的运气大为好转.

sentences.en: Over the last few years tourism here has developed considerably.
sentences.cn: 在过去几年里，这里的旅游业获得了相当大的发展。

sentences.en: She appeared to have changed considerably, which was only to be expected.
sentences.cn: 她看起来变化很大，不过这完全是在意料之中的。

sentences.en: The castle was enlarged considerably in the fifteenth century.
sentences.cn: 这个城堡在15世纪得到了相当大的扩展.

sentences.en: The economic situation has changed considerably.
sentences.cn: 经济形势已发生了相当大的变化.

sentences.en: The need for sleep varies considerably from person to person.
sentences.cn: 不同的人对睡眠的需要差异相当大。

sentences.en: The rate of bombing has slowed considerably.
sentences.cn: 轰炸的速度明显慢了下来。

sentences.en: The river widens considerably as it begins to turn east.
sentences.cn: 河流转向东流时河道大幅度变宽。

sentences.en: The students' work varies considerably in quality.
sentences.cn: 学生作业的质量甚是参差不齐。

sentences.en: The writer's personal appearance picked up the sales of the book considerably.
sentences.cn: 那位作家亲自到场,使那本书的销售量大增.

sentences.en: Their dinner parties had become considerably less formal.
sentences.cn: 他们的晚餐会已经远不如以前正式。

sentences.en: Under the rule of Britain, the prosperity of the island increased considerably.
sentences.cn: 在英国统治下, 该岛的繁荣程度大为提高.

words.tran_cn: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的
